Title: How Cloudflare security responded to log4j2 vulnerability
Description: Yesterday, December 9, 2021, when a serious vulnerability in the popular Java-based logging package log4j was publicly disclosed, our security teams jumped into action to help respond to the first question and answer the second question. This post explores the second.

Title: Mulm, renewable bad energy (@mulmbot)
Description: Hey @unitygames I'd like to know which part of this you think is a revolution? The damage it did to the art community? The damage it does to the environment? The laughing stock we look like as artists to the rest of society? Which part is it and why should I join exactly?
